description.value:
The character channels the power of a fjord linnorm. The character’s melee attacks deal an additional 1 point of cold damage. If the character is knocked unconscious or killed by an attack or spell, the attacker suffers the curse of drowning (Will negates).

A character must be at least 4th level to select this rage power. Curse of Drowning: save Will DC 10 + 1/2 character’s level + character’s Charisma bonus; effect target is unable to breathe water (even with magic), can hold its breath only half as long as normal, and is sickened whenever it holds its breath.
